prompt_text.title: The prompt_text Schema
examples: This is prompt text which may be longer than just a title would be. There might alos be multiple sentences.

comments.title: The comments Schema
examples: These are comments about the images that were generated using the prompt and may also be longer. Or multiple sentences.
